primaryMeaning: To Reach The Peak Of Something
meaningMnemonic:
The kanji itself means <kanji>extreme</kanji>. The verb vocab version isn't "to extreme" because that wouldn't make sense. Instead, you bring something to extremes, making this <vocabulary>to reach the peak of something</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to perfect</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to reach the extreme</vocabulary>.

極める commonly means reaching the highest level of proficiency or excellence in a particular skill, art, or field. It can also mean taking something to the extreme, like being crazy busy.
